mean_cn: n. 老于世故，老练，有经验，有教养，篡改，掺杂之物
mean_en: the process or result of becoming cultured, knowledgeable, or disillusioned
word_etyma: sophisticat使复杂 + ion名词后缀 → sophistication 复杂
sentence: We pride ourselves on the sophistication of our selection of wines.
sentence_trans: 我们对自己选择红酒的老练感到自豪。
sentence_phrase: the sophistication of our selection of wines
